variable.comment: Stores value of closest enemy to the player.
variable.name: HomingIID

events.comment: Allow WASD as alternate controls to arrow keys.
Mirror the player's image so they appear facing the right way when moving left or right.

event-group.description: Contains instructions required for changing Player animation states.
event-group.title: Player Animation

sub-events.comment: When the Space Bar is released during the ascent of a jump. it will stop dead. Gives players control over jump height.
